snippet: In a letter, Senator Ron Wyden of Oregon sought to review secret Justice Department legal opinions justifying the killing of American citizens in counterterrorism operations.
abstract: Oregon Sen Ron Wyden demands that he and other members of Senate Intelligence Committee be able to review secret Justice Department legal opinions justifying the killing of American citizens in counterterrorism operations.
lead_paragraph: In a letter, Senator Ron Wyden of Oregon sought to review secret Justice Department legal opinions justifying the killing of American citizens in counterterrorism operations.

headline.seo: Senator Wyden Asks John Brennan for Legal Opinions on Killings of Americans
headline.main: Senator Asks to View Files on Killings of Americans
headline.print_headline: Senator Asks To View Files On Killings Of Americans
